pasos.titulo: Your medication in a few steps
pasos.paso2: We send you the best option

healthsupply.parrafo: Health Supply offers patients and healthcare professionals, hard to find medicines in their countries, not available due to shortages or lack of registration, we always put the patient safety first and in compliance with legal regulations. To achieve this objective, we have a wide network of distributors and associated laboratories in 4 continents and more than 18 countries. Our strength is to offer all types of medicines aligning ourselves to the specific needs of each patient.

nosotros.parrafo: With more than 20 years of experience in the pharmaceutical market and especially in the Oncology area, it was evident that, in emerging countries, 100% of the treatments indicated to patients could not be performed due to lack of access to medicines. In 2007 HSP was founded, with the aim of offering products not available in emerging countries to patients all over the world.

especialidades.parrafo: Please, go to contact us, send us a request of the medicine you are looking for, and we will quote the best option for you, we have more than 1.600 medicines available. Below, some of the top requested products:

oncologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Opdivo (Nivolumab), Padcev (Enfortumab), Tibsovo (Ivosidenib), Carmustine (Carmustine) y Trodelvi (Sacituzumab).

neurologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Neupro (rotigotine), Wakix (pitolisant), Aduhelm (aducanumab-avwa) y Ponvory (ponesimod).

dermatologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Cibinqo (abrocitinib), Tremfya (guselkumab), Olumiant (baricitinib) y Skilarence (dimethyl fumarate).

patologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Livmarli (maralixibat), Bylvay (odevixibat) y Ocaliva (obeticholic acid).

infectologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Rukobia (fostemsavir), Cabenuva (cabotegravir + rilpivirine), Veklury (remdesivir) y Truvada (emtricitabine / tenofovir disoproxil).

neumologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Rukobia (fostemsavir), Cabenuva (cabotegravir + rilpivirine), Veklury (remdesivir) y Truvada (emtricitabine / tenofovir disoproxil).

reumatologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Kevzara (Sarilumab), Rinvoq (upadacitinib), Jyseleca (filgotinib) y Tremfya (guselkumab).

hematologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Tavneos (avacopan), Ultomiris (ravulizumab), Adakveo (crizanlizumab) y Ondexxya (andexanet alfa).

ginecologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Relumina y Orilissa (elagolix).

endocrinologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Imcivree (setmelanotide), Voxzogo (vosoritide), Zegalogue (dasiglucagon) y Roszet (rosuvastatin and ezetimibe).

cardiologia.parrafo: We have many medicines available for you such as: Repatha (evolocumab), Verquvo (vericiguat), Nexletol (bempedoic acid) y Vascepa (icosapent ethyl).

cotizador.subtitulo: Contact us to know your need
